message: I've always liked the idea of apetheism which was introduced in an article years ago in Harpers (I think). Apetheism is a theological position in which you admit that maybe there's a god and maybe there isn't, but in either case it doesn't make a lot of difference in how you conduct your life. Apetheism: from theism (a belief that god may exist) + apethetic (as in """"who cares"""").

message: Trump won by constant slander of the Clinton campaign, burying the actual issues with slander leading the way.
